pokedex.description: Where you can find all the Pokémon, their stats and models.

user.title: User
user.description: Where you can find your profile, information and your Pokémon.

information.description: Where you can find information about the game.

tutorial.description: Where you can learn how to play the game and new mechanics.

about.title: Explore AltoFlora!
about.description: A new world awaits you in Minecraft with Cobblemon. Discover a unique region, capture exclusive Pokémon and join a community of trainers. Build, battle and become the best. Don't miss this epic adventure.
